snippet: A New York hedge fund has taken some of its Lending Club loans and sold them in a $53 million securitization. Are more such deals likely to be on the horizon?
abstract: A New York hedge fund has taken some of its Lending Club loans and sold them in a $53 million securitization. Are more such deals likely to be on the horizon?

headline.main: A Step Toward 'Peer to Peer' Lending Securitization
